property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D. You may reveal X copies of Fear the Masses from your grip to force the Corp to trash X additional cards. Limit 6 per deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has a rez cost of 5 or greater. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. 2[Credits]: Swap Aghora with a deva program from your grip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Destroyer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time you make a successful run on HQ each turn, force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't want to listen, so we'll just have to crank up the volume."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Corp cannot win the game unless the Runner is flatlined. When your turn begins, place 1 power counter on The Black File. When there are 3 or more power counters on The Black File, remove it from the game. Limit 1 per deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, trash an installed connection. The Corp cannot advance cards during his or her next turn. Remove The Price of Freedom from the game instead of trashing it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you use Ankusa to break all subroutines on a barrier during a single encounter, add that barrier to HQ. 2[Credits]: Break barrier subroutine. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Secretly spend up to 2[Credits]. The Corp guesses how much you spent. Reveal spent credits. If the Corp guessed incorrectly, make a run and choose a piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Bypass that ice when you encounter it.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you rez Magnet, host a program on it that is hosted on an installed piece of ice. The text box of each program hosted on Magnet is blank. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the enemy has mastered the battlefield, change the battlefield." -The Playbook

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 4[Credits]. You may install 1 card (paying the install cost).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Practical effects are expensive, but worth it. I had to smash seventeen stunt bioroids to get this shot." -Parvati Kapoor, director

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Improved Protein Source is scored or stolen, the Runner gains 4[Credits].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They eat us, we eat them, the cycle goes on and on. -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops-Psi

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if there is an agenda in the Runner's score area. You and the Runner secretly spend 0[Credits], 1[Credits], or 2[Credits]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, trash 1 resource.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Where You're the Star

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged, he or she plays with his or her grip revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We Know What You Want.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Full Immersion RecStudio can host up to 2 assets and/or agendas. The trash cost of Full Immersion RecStudio is increased by 3 for each card hosted on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The costumes aren't strictly necessary, but they improve the performances of the vactors and sensie stars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card costs 0 influence if you have 6 or more non-alliance [nbn] cards in your deck. As an additional cost to rez Ibrahim Salem, forfeit an agenda. When your turn begins, name a card type. Look at the Runner's grip and trash 1 card in it of the named type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During a run on this server, the Runner cannot use paid abilities on non-icebreaker cards. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The entertainment capital of Mumbad.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Zealous Judge can only be rezzed if the Runner is tagged. [Click], 1[Credits]: Give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash all cards in HQ (minimum of 1). Draw 5 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A new administration means we have to start greasing the wheels all over again. Let's get to work."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner is tagged. Play up to 2 operations from HQ (paying all costs), resolving them one at a time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Judicious use of freelancers can increase efficiency and protect the company from legal repercussions. It's what they call a "win-win".

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Merger is worth 1 additional agenda point while in the Runner's score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Survival of the fittest' is so outdated; in finance it's 'survival of the fattest.' -Omar Keung, "the Flashpoint"
